content: चूर्णकः [चूर्ण स्वार्थे क] Grain fried and pounded. --कं {@--1@} A fragrant powder. {@--2@} A style of prose-composition which is easy, does not contain hard letters, and has very few compounds; अकठोराक्षरं स्वल्पसमासं चूर्णकं विदुः Cand. <ls>M. 6.</ls> {@--3@} Explaining in prose the purport of a foregoing verse.
